mapper.insert: INSERT INTO printer_info ( id, host, service_port, event_port, task_num, create_time ) VALUES (#{id}, #{host}, #{servicePort}, #{eventPort}, #{taskNum}, now())
mapper.update: UPDATE printer_info SET task_num = #{taskNum}, beat_time = now() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, host, service_port, event_port, task_num FROM printer_info WHERE time_to_sec(timediff(now(), beat_time)) < #{timeout}
